name: Nickelfox
description:
At Nickelfox, we use our technology passion and skills along with our understanding of business and usability, to create innovative solutions for our clients.
Our team has delivered hundreds of successful software and mobile app projects. Our clients include innovative startups and enterprises across multiple verticals including life sciences, commercial, industrial and high technology. Our clients have come to rely on our expertise, reliability and speed for bringing innovation to reality.
Â 
Through a collaborative and consultative process, we take the time to learn your business and unique requirements and then bring our deep practical experience and technical know-how to deliver innovative technology solutions.
